paragraphs.text: Six months after the end of the Anti-bending Revolution, Team Avatar, Tenzin, and his family attended the Glacier Spirits Festival. During the festival, Avatar Korra learned from her uncle about the spirit attacks on ships in southern waters. Despite the latter's insistence to become her spiritual mentor, Korra's father, Tonraq, refused his brother's offer, reaffirming that Korra's training would only be overseen by Tenzin. During their discussion, Korra discovered that she was incorrect in believing it was Aang who tasked the White Lotus with keeping her in the South Pole, and that the decision to isolate her was instead made by Tenzin and her father.
